UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Plant defensin peptides have antifungal and antibacterial activity against human and plant pathogens.
Literature.Author: Sathoff AE, Velivelli S, Shah D, Samac DA

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Fusarium oxysporum f. sp. medicaginis 7F-3(IC50=33.1±1.9µM),Fusarium oxysporum f. sp. medicaginis 31F-3(no activity data),Ascochyta medicaginicola STC(IC50=6.4±0.6µM),Ascochyta medicaginicola WS-2(IC50=6.1±0.6µM),Colletotrichum trifolii FG-1(no activity data),Colletotrichum trifolii WS-5(no activity data),Aphanomyces euteiches MF-1(no activity data),Aphanomyces euteiches MER4(no activity data),Fusarium solani(IC50=13.8±0.9µM),Fusarium tricinctum(no activity data),Fusarium redolens(no activity data),Fusarium incarnatum(no activity data),Xanthomonas alfalfae subsp. alfalfae F3(IC50=19.3±2.2µM),Pseudomonas syringae pv. syringae ALF3(IC50=25.9±1.2µM)
